locations.name: Home
locations.brief_description: Your lovely home!!! You always wanna sleep in your bed when the time you know you have to study for exams and papers. AND, IT IS NOT THE TIME TO SLEEP!!!

locations.name: Bahen Centre 1F
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. Be ready for your journey!!!
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. Now you were a first year student in computer science!!! It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. One student is rushing down the corridor, wearing a heavy-looking backpack and carrying a textbook in their arms. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.

locations.name: BA1100
locations.Lose_and_you_come_back_again_description: Again, find it! This is our beginning of memory.YOU ARE DETERMINED
locations.Win_or/and_you_com_back_again_descriptio: Congratulations, you've found it! Don't stop, the journey is really long
locations.First_time_here_description: Your first CSC110 lecture was here. People around were feeling curious about their first computer science lecture! Remember? Professor_S loves taking photos with cats, her photo album should be here. Find it!

locations.name: BA1110
locations.Lose_and_you_come_back_again_description: Again, find it! This is our beginning of memory. DETERMINATION
locations.Win_or/and_you_com_back_again_descriptio: Congratulations, you've found it! Don't stop, the journey is really long
locations.First_time_here_description: Your first CSC111 lecture was here. It was just days ago. You feel really lucky after you passed CSC110, however, someone did not... OK, it's time to find the camera

locations.name: BA1999
locations.Lose_and_you_come_back_again_description: IN MY ABSOLUTE WAY, no more puzzles
locations.Win_or/and_you_com_back_again_descriptio: Congratulations!!! Now I believe you have the power to win the game
locations.First_time_here_description: You never hear about this room before, it is really dark. You feel overwhelmed somehow. I have to tell you that the puzzle here is challenging, be prepared!

locations.name: Bahen Centre 2F
locations.brief_description: You are on the second floor of the Bahen Center. Those devices and computers... you don't care. YOU DO CARE ABOUT THE MEMORY
locations.long_description: You are on the second floor of the Bahen Center. Computer Science Specialist is already here! You've found those courses in second year really challenging. But don't worry, there are a lot of more resources here and more opportunities here to guide you.

locations.name: BA2024
locations.Lose_and_you_come_back_again_description: Don't lose hope, here are some many people around you and help you! KEEP DETERMINED
locations.Win_or/and_you_com_back_again_descriptio: Congratulations, you've found it! Don't stop, the journey is really long
locations.First_time_here_description: You feel quite confident to become a Computer Science Specialist! Look at those seniors, they are so powerful in this class. But most importantly, don't forget your memory with your first year students, teachers and friends. If you lose it, then find it!

locations.name: BA2025
locations.Lose_and_you_come_back_again_description: Don't lose hope, here are some many people around you and help you! KEEP DETERMINED
locations.Win_or/and_you_com_back_again_descriptio: Congratulations, you've found it! Don't stop, the journey is really long
locations.First_time_here_description: You feel quite confident to become a Computer Science Specialist! Look at those seniors, they are so powerful in this class. But most importantly, don't forget your memory with your first year students, teachers and friends. If you lose it, then find it!

locations.name: Bahen Centre 3F
locations.brief_description: You are on the third floor of the Bahen Center. Those devices and computers... you don't care. YOU DO CARE ABOUT THE MEMORY
locations.long_description: You are on the third floor of the Bahen Centre. Look yourself, you have already been a third year student studying computer science in UofT, this lovely community, you will never forget the people once helped you, you will never lose hope, you are determined to pursue you dream. But ost importantly, don't lose your memory

locations.name: Lab X
locations.Lose_and_you_come_back_again_description: You have already been here, just need one more step! DETERMINATION
locations.Win_or/and_you_com_back_again_descriptio: Congratulations, you've found it! Don't stop, the journey is STILL really long
locations.First_time_here_description: Omg... lots of sophisticated devices... lots of complicated knowledge... you know you have to fight with it... Lab X is unknown... But the only thing you need to do, is to find the USB!!! Emmm... why the place smelled so weird???

locations.name: Robarts Library 1F
locations.long_description: Welcome to the Robert Library! A huge library where many students study here... FOR THE EXAMS AND PAPERS

items.name: Professor_S's camera
items.description: Omg, Sony Alpha 7 IV! SO EXPENSIVE

items.name: Diary: CSC110's Memory
items.description: You can't believe how time passes, that's your beginning of the journey

items.name: Diary: CSC111's Memory
items.description: You can't believe how time passes, that's your beginning of the journey

items.name: USB STICK
items.description: 999TB memory storage, where you can put your whole life's memory in it

items.name: Pie
items.description: YOU ARE DETERMINED, pay tribute to <<Undertale>>
items.Function: Unlimited steps for all the rooms

items.name: Dry Noodles
items.description: It tastes better when eaten dry, from businessman

items.name: Your TCard
items.description: Why it is here, oh maybe I forgot somehow...? I can't go library without this

items.name: Silver Treasure Chest
items.description: Wow, a nice looking chest, must be something valuable inside

npcs.name: Professor_S
npcs.Mission Complete Description: Congratulations! Now I want you to find...
